team.name: Bianca Tomenson
team.description:
Bianca has spent ten years in the private wealth industry and is highly adept at handling administrative support and financial planning service role. 

Prior to joining High Rock, Bianca worked at various Investment Dealers in Toronto. She has progressed up through the ranks from Administration to Associate Advisor and now Certified Financial Planner professional. 

At High Rock, Bianca is our Certified Financial Planner, so her main role is to work with clients and the Portfolio Managers on creating individualized wealth forecasts.   This is an extremely important part of our Private Client division as each wealth forecast forms the basis for our allocation to our Private Client Models.  

Bianca was awarded her Certified Financial Planner designation in December 2014, obtained her license to sell life insurance from the Financial Services Commission of Ontario in October 2015 and is currently working towards her Chartered Investment Manager (CIM) designation. 

She also attended the Culinary Arts Program at George Brown College in 2008 and was a Sous Chef at Leslie Jones in Leslieville for three years while working part time at a former investment dealer. Bianca lives in the east end of Toronto with her husband, Thatcher, and their new addition, Mason, born June 2017. During tax season she volunteers her time at an income tax preparation clinic at at the Central Eglinton Community Centre (CECC) preparing returns for eligible low income individuals who need to file in order to qualify to various government benefits.
